scenarios.it: make new insurance + ask about insurance coverage

POST.Name: Travel Medical Insurance
Features: Travel medical insurance for individuals, families and groups
Coverage for medical expenses, evacuation, and repatriation

POST.Name: Patriot WorldWide Plus
Features: Coverage for acute onset of pre-existing conditions

POST.Name: Global Medical Insurance
Features: Long-term (1+ year) comprehensive worldwide medical insurance for individuals and families

POST.Name: Patriot WorldWide Plus
Features: Coverage for acute onset of pre-existing conditions

Here are the details for Patriot WorldWide Plus.
The total cost for 21 days is $81.10 and you get:
• Renewable up to 24 months
• Deductible options from $0 to $2,500
• Maximum Limits from $50,000 to $500,000
• Coverage for acute onset of pre-existing conditions
